name: Preab
description:
Preab is a physics-based puzzle game, where each level you only have one chance to throw the ball to guide your "flies" to the end goal, avoiding obstacles and challenging your dexterity!

Art style is inspired by the design of the Famicom, because why not.

Preab (per-ab) is Irish, meaning "to bounce a ball (verb)".

Game design, art, programming, music and sound by William Mc Cabe.
